Tutorial: ^How do I get back to my world?
^What should I take note of, when talking to the commuters?

c-0: ^You have entered the COMMUTING ZONE, where the commuters that did not receive assistance are sent here.
c-1: ^You were chosen to assist commuters that need your help, click on the commuters that could give you hints to find commuters who you can help.
c-2: ^There will be mini-games that appear everytime you practice the 3As (Assess,Ask and Assist). Do it 10 times and you will return.
c-3: ^Do not talk to them when they are talking, and always ask if they need help before helping them. Last but not least, click to continue or stop talking to them.
